metadata.name: From Colors To Lines I
metadata.description:
Title: From Colors To Lines I
Dimension: 3840 x 2160 pixel (4K)
Format: MP4 (30fps)
Audio: 48kHz Stereo
Duration: 1 minutes 26 seconds ∞ 
Collection : 1/7

From Colors To Lines (I) is an ambient meditative work evoking a sense of peaceful stillness with high frequencies colors & harmonies. 

about the series:
Atmospheric audiovisual collection of 7 works exploring slow morphing linear color phasing accompanied by evocative soundscapes in an infinite loop ∞
